headline: Does Lucid (LCID) Using Rockwell Software in Saudi Arabia Reframe Its Manufacturing Execution Risk?
summary: Rockwell Automation recently announced it will roll out its FactoryTalk manufacturing execution software and workforce training programs at Lucid Group’s Saudi Arabia plant, aiming to improve production visibility and operational efficiency at the Kingdom’s first vehicle manufacturing site. This expanded collaboration reinforces Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030 industrial goals while giving Lucid a more sophisticated backbone to support its planned global manufacturing scale-up. We’ll now examine...

headline: Lucid and Rockwell Strengthen Production Backbone in Saudi Arabia
summary: Lucid deepens ties with Rockwell Automation to scale its Saudi EV plant, boosting real-time control and output.

headline: Lucid Group (LCID) Soars 20% on International Expansion
summary: We recently published 10 Big Names Leaving Wall Street Behind; 7 Are Hitting Record Highs. Lucid Group Inc. (NASDAQ:LCID) was one of the worst performers on Wednesday. Lucid Group soared by as much as 19.6 percent on Wednesday to hit $11.64 at intra-day trading, as investors took heart from its planned manufacturing expansion in Saudi […]

headline: Rockwell Automation to Report First Quarter Fiscal 2026 Results
summary: MILWAUKEE, January 22, 2026--Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK) is scheduled to report its first quarter fiscal 2026 results on Thursday, Feb. 5, before the market opens. The release will be posted on the Rockwell Investor Relations website at www.rockwellautomation.com/en-us/investors.html.
